website_summaries.verdict: Samsung's inexpensive DV300F gives you a neat front LCD for self portraits, a sharp lens, and an excellent Wi-Fi experience. But this compact camera is downright sluggish.
cons: Waxy images at middling ISO settings

customer_reviews.title: GOT A GREAT USED CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: GREAT CAMERA-- SENT ME A CHARGER THAT DIDN'T WORK BUT QUICK RESPONSE -- DID NOT ASK FOR ANOTHER AS I FOUND MY OLD CAMERA CORD WOULD STILL FIT AND CHARGE FROM COMPUTER TO THIS NEWER CAMERA-
customer_reviews.author: Tracey D.

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera as a gift for someone who had the same camera but the previous model. The screen in front is a great feature but requires a learning curve. They loved the previous model so I purchased this one for them when they dropped their old one and broke it. The WiFi feature is nice and the camera performs good for the price I paid for it. If you are expecting to get a professional camera for the this price then look elsewhere. It has basic functions for the everyday user or someone young in need of a camera. Quality of pictures is nice and like stated before for the price you cant complain. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Young NYer 10

customer_reviews.title: MY FIRST DAY WITH THIS CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: IM LOVING THIS SO FAR!!!!!!!! PICTURES COME OUT BEAUTIFULLY LOOOOOVVEEEEEEE ITTTT but ive only had this for a day so i dont know much about it yet but first impression: AMAZING CAMERA FOR THE PRICE INDEED also, shipping was SUPERD!!! i got amazon prime and this took a day to get to me! SUPER FAST!!!!! *UPDATE* My second day with the camera, i noticed the battery went down like crazy even though i barely touch the thing! A bit upset at how fast the battery dies but still very satisfied with the camera
customer_reviews.author: Linh nguyen

customer_reviews.title: I think this is a great camera. Unfortunately the one I received didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great camera. Unfortunately the one I received didn't work. But Samsung has good product. This camerea has a decent response time (for a non-SLR) as long as you don't have the auto flash enabled. Decent amount of options for photo filters and editing. Front facing screen is nice. Kids mode works to catch kids attention. Wifi capabilities are cool but I have never been able to use it
customer_reviews.author: derek hulett

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: This camera arrived nicely boxed and packed and a day or two sooner than expected for the free shipping. I got it primarily for easy uploading of pictures to Facebook or Picasa and it works perfectly. The WiFi connection is fast and the pictures are very good for an inexpensive camera. Navigation through the settings is somewhat confusing and for my eyes the icons are very tiny. The included "Getting started" manual is minimal - but there is a very thorough PDF manual available at [...] I'm well satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: C. N. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Samsung DV300F
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I had one before and it got lint on the sensor it would have been more expensive to have it fixed. the camera is discontinued so for the price i paid it was worth it. its good for close up and simple fun pics. its the only camera where the battery lasts a very very long time, it has WiFi and Dual View.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Pintabone

customer_reviews.title: Too many clicks to switch between photos and videos
customer_reviews.text: Used this camera on a recent 5 week trip abroad. I am happy with the quality and the feature set but one thing that I found really inconvenient wad switching between photo and video, it takes 4 clicks of 3 different buttons to switch. Capturing vacation moments frequently involve both videos and still photos so this camera is a poor choice for that. Furthermore, the switching is further delayed by about 1 second after power on due to its internal initialization so I missed many photo opportunities due to 1 second delay and 4 clicks of 3 different buttons. If you are taking still photos exclusively, this review won't apply to you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More than Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, to tell you the true, this would be the best camera I've ever bought, this is an amazing camera but what I like most its the screen in front it makes to take pictures of myself so easy, my friend was speechless when she saw the HD of my pictures, the ''high definition'' in pictures and videos is incredible! I honestly recommend it to all those people who likes to take pictures with a very good quality !!!
customer_reviews.author: Omar Ramirez Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera with Great Features
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend and I bought this camera to use when we traveled through Europe. It worked great! The camera has multiple modes including smart-photo, smart-video, and panoramic. The front-view LCD screen was one of our favorite features. It allowed us to take self-photos in front of landmarks without always having to ask someone to take the picture for us. Our one complaint was that we had difficulty getting the camera to upload pictures to the internet unless the wifi in the area was incredibly strong. It worked at home in our apartment, but in local places like Starbucks it did not work.
customer_reviews.author: cdw118

customer_reviews.title: Great Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a surprise birthday gift for my boyfriend because he loved my camera which is similar. He absolutely loved it and was fascinated by all the features and great picture quality. Plus it is a "smart" camera which means you can email pics from the camera. He just purchased a "smart" flatscreen tv so I wanted to add to his "smart" collection. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. This camera takes great pictures and there are many cool features as well. I love the front LCD screen which make self portrait very easy to snap. The wifi feature is another cool feature as well but it does take a long time to upload. The best thing about the camera is the internal battery which I was able to take 235 pictures before recharging.
customer_reviews.author: E Rice

customer_reviews.title: Great fun Camera
customer_reviews.text: This really a nice camera, WiFi, apps, etc, so many things you can do right on the camera with your pictures,The Video is excellent quality and picture quality is the same. Using it all the time. I have a larger SLR camera but use this one more often, Great for self portrait with front view display! I bought another for my sister!
customer_reviews.author: Pelicanpat

customer_reviews.title: the dual camera that this smart camera has makes it one of my favorite camera
customer_reviews.text: the dual camera that this smart camera has makes it one of my favorite camera... I could take pics with it, or through my smartphone, I could also edit, view and post directly through this camera.. the video quality is not that great, but for the price, I think it is fair enough.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Excelent
customer_reviews.text: The main advantage is its wifi capability, works perfect, very easy to publish pictures in Facebook, send emails when you have wifi communication. You can always appear in a group picture using the auto shoot function, and the countdown timer, works perfect. Excellent quality in pictures. Micro SD card is a great advantage. Communication with your TV set to view your albums is great.
customer_reviews.author: Victor M Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, unfortunately. Fall down from 30 cm height on the lens and got broken the focus mechanism. Can not recommend to buy, I use Nikon and Canon instead.
customer_reviews.author: Andrey Kuznetsov

customer_reviews.title: The front view is not working
customer_reviews.text: The lady called Sara is their CS. She will make you feel like you're dumb. Be careful they send out defective product and gonna try to blame it on you. The front view of the camera is blink only LED light on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact, easy to operate, fair price
customer_reviews.text: I first bought a dual view Samsung camera a couple of years ago for a family member. She liked so much that her sister asked me to bring her one. They both enjoy the front little screen for self-shots, how easy is to operate this camera and the compact size of it. Fair price too.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Iguatemy

customer_reviews.title: My awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself. The main feature I considered was the front view screen so you can see yourself before and while taking a picture of yourself. Samsung is a brand that is well known and that I trust and I am more than happy with my camera. It is very user friendly and I would urge anyone considering buying a camera to consider this one. Very reasonably priced for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Russell

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: So far it's been fabulous. Too bad they discontinued it. I had one before and damaged which is why I wanted another.
customer_reviews.author: David Bettis

customer_reviews.title: It is easy for her to carry in pocket when she is ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a grad gift and she is a student that is at a art school.she loves it. It is easy for her to carry in pocket when she is required to take pictures for class, of the city. Has been using it for two years now and has not asked or wanted another camera.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Completely satisfied with the product purchase. Excellent quality and speed when sending the article. I recommend it. I have tested and reviewed the product and I have not had anything that disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Sanz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is the best camera I have ever had. It takes very clear pictures and has lots of cool tools to play around with for neat pictures.
customer_reviews.author: danagirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use.and the pictures are great. Great for teens who like to take selfies.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my in-laws. It's nice and works well, it's super functional and very user friendly. The user-friendly part was probably the most important aspect because they don't adjust to technology well. Surprisingly, they really like the dual-view feature the most. Great, simple point & shoot camera.
customer_reviews.author: D. Louie

customer_reviews.title: A gift for mom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Mother's Day gift for my mom and I knew she would love it but she loved it more than I could even imagine. Everyday since Mother's Day I have got a phone call about a new feature she has found on the camera. The children's mode is a life saver. Quick delivery & great product, what more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: michelle T

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes great pictures & has been super easy to use & download pics. I would recommend this camera to my family and or friends. very good buy for the price. I love the dual view screen very fun to use and snap pics
customer_reviews.author: malibu

customer_reviews.title: Takes very good pictures
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my wife as a birthday gift. I think her favorite feature is the dual display and facial recognition. The dual display makes it easy to take perfect self portraits and the facial recognition ensures that your pictures come out perfect every time. I compared this camera to many other cameras and feel this is much better than many cameras that sell for twice as much
customer_reviews.author: Insomniacfogt

customer_reviews.title: dont buy
customer_reviews.text: its the worst camera ever , does not take any good photos , its very bad any little shake ruin the photo

customer_reviews.title: One of the best!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is extremely lightweight, the colour and focus is great, its user friendly, the children's setting is amazing! It's a totally awesome buy. The one thing I didn't like is the fact that it's not a touchscreen, however, for the price its a great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Great Features
customer_reviews.text: This product Has wonderful Features. The app feature was a little hard to figure out at first and sometimes it doesn't always work. But the camera takes excellent pictures and has lots of features you can't find on other camers.

customer_reviews.title: awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous camera its simple to use and i like photos and videos i love it clearly i recomend all people

customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how small this camera is, but my son loves it and the cool features on it, like a screen in front and in back, and the ability to email photos from the camera itself.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy
customer_reviews.text: This camera is... Small, Cheap, Easy to use, Great resolution Comes with many features & the computer software is easy to use.. YEAH! I like it a lot.

customer_reviews.title: awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: I Saw this camera in stores and had to have it. I absolutely love it! I did have a problem with Samsung never packaged a battery but I called them and everything was fixed immediately. I recommend this camera to anyone!

customer_reviews.title: Does anything u could imagine
customer_reviews.text: I have HAD to get a new camera every year or 5 yrs bc someone always steals them :( I don't mind having to get a new one BUT they could at least leave me the memory card bc some pics u can never get back. Ne ways out of all the cameras I have had this one is my fav.!!! The things u can do on it is endless. The screen on the front is one of my fav features it makes taking a pic by ur self super easy!!

customer_reviews.title: Wi-fi half of the time
customer_reviews.text: It's suppose to be a Wi-fi camera but I'm only able to post pics online half of the time. Other than that, it's a great camera. I love the front facing screen. It's so convenient.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is an AWESOME camera. Took it all the way to Nigeria with me and it gave me some beautiful photos and some great video footage

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This camera is just amazing. I took it abroad in New Zealand.

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: small compact camera, ease of use and takes great pictures. Have not used all the features. more to come but for right now I am happy with the purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Love the camera
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. The camera is actually very easy to use. A lot of photoshop functions and good flash. It was very light and fit perfectly in my purse

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I own a coiled of slr cameras but this is a great one to take on the go. Compact and love the front display!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda D.

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera.
customer_reviews.text: The best camera I have had in a long time. I love the front screen feature. Pretty cool for those fb pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Gina F. Yoakum

customer_reviews.title: Picture Quality is not good
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera for about 4 months now and I honestly can say the picture quality is not good. Especially considering the 16.1 Mega pixels of this camera. I have taken about 200 photos and had only 15 of them clear. I do not like the picture quality so I am not sure how to rate this camera. Now, this camera does come with many features such as Wifi and built in software it is fun to play around with it. However, bottom line is the picture quality is unsatisfactory for me. So I will give it a 3 star and probably will never buy another Samsung camera.
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera, exactly what I was looking for and more.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good and complete camera. I can conected my Samsung Galaxy S3 and my camera for better results, share and easier taking pictures. High quality pictures & videos, funny & artistics effects. I can share directly from camera with WiFi. Battery life is not too long, but recharge is quick & easy. Conclusion: One of the best purchase I ever made! I love it!

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my grandaughter wanted for her birthday. A little higher in price Thani found elsewhere but they were sold out!

Upload and store cool images and video directly from the camera to Microsoft Skydive and access your uploaded content on supported connected devices via All Share Play.

customer_reviews.text: I love the camera, works very good, takes pictures very fast. It also has a thing on the camera to make the kids laugh..

customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this camera. It is easy to use and I like all the features it offers. Pictures come out very good.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Pics are clear and beautiful! I only brought the camera for my best friend wedding but i use the camera for everything!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Samsung products are just great! This camera is not only light and filled with great features, the quality of the pictures are SWEET!

customer_reviews.title: perfect camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera was everything I expected. The picture are crstal clear. I didn't notice a delay in the shutter time like some reviews say. The camera is small and compact so it makes ot easy to carry around with you. I love this camera so muc! It does take a micro sd card so purchase one with your camera.

customer_reviews.title: Love my camera
customer_reviews.text: Light. Easy to operate. Does everything I want a camera to do and more. Highly recommend it for travel and compactness.

customer_reviews.title: Great price greatest functionality
customer_reviews.text: Simple high quality camera, very light weight.. confortable, good look. The front LCD it's just amazing!!! All the effects, the definition of the photo its really good for a pocket camera. Im realy happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Danrock

customer_reviews.title: Great with one reservation...
customer_reviews.text: This camera does a great job at taking pictures. I also love the wi-fi and other options. What I'm not understanding, and the reason I gave the 4-stars is the lack of a lens cover. I suppose the best thing to do if you get this camera is get a hard shell case...because you'll need it (you can't put the camera - without a lens cover) in your pocket and expect to have a scratch free lens.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance- Customer Since 1998

customer_reviews.title: Great For The Money
customer_reviews.text: Great product didn't see anything wrong except for a few minor things. Took pictures smoothly just wasn't so pretty at low lighting situations that also goes for recording. While recording in dark places the FPS drops for some reason. But above any of those minor things its a great camera.
customer_reviews.author: Wings

customer_reviews.title: present for myself
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera!! I have a two year old daughter that's always on the go and its so hard to catch her for the camera but this camera has a children feature that plays cool animations in the front. Now I can take a picture with Both mg children not just one! Lol

customer_reviews.title: Died within a day.
customer_reviews.text: The camera is very nice and the front LCD is amazing. It is invisible until you turn it on. The problem is it died after one day of operation as the zoom jammed. Nothing could get it back to working so I had to return it. Great idea poorly executed! Thank goodness Amazon have a no hassle return policy.

customer_reviews.title: I love it

It was a good price fore what I was looking for. I bought one for myself and my mother-in-law and she loves it. I recommend it to anyone.

Price was great too. It's not a "top of the top" camera, but it exceeds expectations of a $150 purchase for sure :)

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: The camera takes very nice pictures, but is a bit slow. If you want to take a pictures of moving objects, or want to take several shots in rapid succession, this camera may not be best for you. If you like taking pictures of yourself, then having an LCD screen on the front of the camera is a plus.

customer_reviews.text: I did like this camera, however it broke within the first few days of having it. I returned it back to Amazon, and was refunded the money very quickly. The wifi connectivity is hit or miss too. Spend a few extra dollars and get the Dv150f instead! That's what I did and its a better camera.

However, the camera broke the following day. I contacted samsung and they stated it happens frequently with this model and could have been because of shipping. I keep my camera in my purse and need a durable long lasting camera. Do not buy if you want a camera to last. I returned it for another samsung model and have started to have problems with this camera as well....

There's also a cool "kid" mode that plays a cartoon on the front to get a child's attention when taking their picture... works great for pets, too!

customer_reviews.text: great options and picture quality! love the fact that I dont need to buy batteries, just plug it in to charge it. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Matt & Lavon

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. The dual screen is really fun to use. I bought this camera for my mom because she loves taking pictures of the new baby. It's also super easy to email and post pictures to Facebook.
customer_reviews.author: Laxjillie22

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera for a great price and I love it . next time let a person know that it would be a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Secret Lady

customer_reviews.title: We love this Camera
customer_reviews.text: We love this camera!!! The best feature is being able to upload directly to wifi since we usually use our smart phones this is great to help not take up so much space on our iphones. Love this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Hester

customer_reviews.title: great deal and the product, as a point and shoot its capturing some great pictures.
customer_reviews.text: nice camera and thats not just for the money but for the features. The battery life is also much better then expected, last a full day.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Very good price and quality product very happy with purchase thank you very much excellent product excellent material for easy grip and handling
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Pernia

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: Slow shutter response and requires too much distance to focus. Other than this, it seems to be a good camera for low budget. Suitable for beginers that do not have high expectations from a budget camera.
customer_reviews.author: Nelu

customer_reviews.title: Dual?  Isn't that means two???
customer_reviews.text: Last december 2012 I ordered Samsung DV300F "Dual" View Smart Camera - Black (EC-DV300FBPBUS), It was a present to my syster..... so I received the camera in time for my trip to Venezuela.... I kind of check that the box and it's specifications, I openned to make sure the camera was in it. My surprise when I gave it to my syster it did not have the front view... it had the square marked for it but that was it. to late for me to return it since I was in Venezuela alrerady.
customer_reviews.author: Tani

customer_reviews.title: EXCELENTE
customer_reviews.text: EL PRODUCTO ERA LO QUE ESPERABA, QUEDE CONFORME, ME GUSTO LA CALIDAD, EXITOS EXITOS EXITOS. EXITOS, EXITOS. BUEN PRODUCTO. SUERTE
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Delgado

product_meta.title: Samsung DV300F Dual View Smart Camera - Black (EC-DV300FBPBUS) (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description: You can send quality photos from the party directly from the camera via email to social network sites like Facebook. Easily connect and share from any public Wi-Fi hotspot using the camera's log-in browser. Upload and store cool images and video directly from the camera to Microsoft Skydive and access your uploaded content on supported connected devices via All Share Play.
